result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demari Alfonzo Straham

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in court.  Attorney Ashley Fard in court for Demari Alfonzo Straham.  Attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Final Pre-Trial. The State requests an adjournment, due to essential witness unavailability and potential discovery issue. No objections from defense. Court vacates jury trial date and orders case adjourned for a status conference date to Br 16.
Status conference scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 10-27-22
Received and Filed. NOTICE OF MOTION TO ADJOURN

State's Witness List.  Received and Filed.  nk

Received and Filed. ADDENDUM TO STATES WITNESS LIST
State's Motion in Limine.  Received and Filed.  nk
State's Requested Jury Instructions.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status of counsel.  Attorney Fard recently appointed.  Defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Court ordered all final pre-trial documents to be filed by 10-21-22.  Case adjourned to Branch 16, Rm 503 CH.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: LVD
dated 7/14/2022 from defendant, received and filed
Ashley Fard

Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference.  Attorney Harris informs court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable. Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to Br 16.  Status conference scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 5-24-22
Received and Filed. NOTICE OF MOTION TO WITHDRAW AS COUNSEL

records.addlTxt: Filed: Original Transcript of PRELIMINARY HEARING (14 pages) commencing 03-09-2022, by KAREN PALIS.
22RM012539  Actual Date Bond Posted with *sheriff 03/16/2022

Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in court with Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris; both appear by video.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Court took judicial notice of 21CF731. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer S. Menge.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 03-08-2022
Received and Filed. STATE PUBLIC DEFENDER - ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Demari Alfonzo Straham in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Demari Alfonzo Straham appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
